contentForEmpty.descriptionPart1: Get started with training plans by adding a certification. Prodigy will build a plan based on your certification level, department affiliation, and state.
contentForEmpty.descriptionPart2: Our training plans allow you to enter your certification details and instantly see what you need to complete. Training plans take the stress out of tracking your recertification and allow for customized training paths.
